title: Boy finds giant earthworm in his backyard
description: Barnaby Domigan revealed what he named his "amazing discovery" in an interview with Radio New Zealand.

title: Mom and son share videos of daily life with no clean water in Jackson, Mississippi
description: The city of Jackson, Mississippi, has been without clean water for days. Rozetta Womack has resorted to storing water in tubs so it can be boiled and safely used by her and her son.
